thread.section_title: The Time New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 5 star service for non 5 star price
thread.title_full: 5 star service for non 5 star price - Review of The Time New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Wesam M
title: 5 star service for non 5 star price
text:
Stayed for 3 nights during my honeymoon; they gave us an upgrade to a bigger room. Great coffee on the ground floor, and very well designed rooms and spaces.
The entire staff was superb, from Gilbert and Wilson to Jack, Lisa, Howard and Lieyah. Thank you for a great stay
